actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should call upon the International Committee of the Red Cross to visit and account for the United States citizens being held hostage in Iran.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should call upon the International Committee of the Red Cross to visit the hostages at the U.S. Embassy in Iran and account for the number and condition of those hostages.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should call upon the International Committee of the Red Cross to visit and account for the United States citizens being held hostage in Iran.
